select u.*,e.name as empName from mccdesign.dbo.t_system_user u left join mccdesign.dbo.t_system_employee e on u.empId = e.id where u.flag = 1 and u.loginName!='root'
and u.loginName like '%${userName}%'
and u.isAdmin = ${isAdmin}
order by u.crTime desc
select id,name,remark from mccdesign.dbo.t_system_user where flag = 1
select id,empId,loginName,password,isAdmin,email,remark from mccdesign.dbo.t_system_user where flag = 1 and empId=#{empId}
select * from mccdesign.dbo.t_system_user where loginName=#{name} and flag = 1
select count(*) from mccdesign.dbo.t_system_user where id!=#{id} and loginName = #{loginName}
